•   National and international examples of good practice (for example, based on BFHI principles) should be 
compared and contrasted, in terms of capacity-building for professionals delivering services for maternal, 
newborn and infant health.
•   The reasons for non-attendance by women and teenagers of low socioeconomic status should be monitored.
•   Birth weight alone is probably a poor indicator of optimum development [9,68] as it appears to be a
